alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 3:49PM CDT until March 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND NORTHERN LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 349 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dublin to near Blaine, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Sunnyside and Minter City around 410 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Schlater and Doddsville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
